title: 87x5: 18 U.S.C. § 207 Restrictions on Former U.S. Attorney's Representation of Individual
summary: OGE advised an agency ethics official that 18 U.S.C. § 207(b)(i) would prohibit a former US Attorney for two years following government service from representing an individual in matters relating to a plea agreement and narcotics prosecution in an investigation in which his former office and various other federal districts were involved.
